title: News and Views
additional-note: The first renewed issue of any periodical named 'News and Views' is for the January 1946 issue of the magazine published by the Dr. Pepper Company.  The first contribution renewal citing any periodical named 'News and Views' is for a contribution in a March 7, 1947 issue.  We do not know whether that was also an issue of the magazine published by Dr. Pepper, or of some other magazine with the same name.
